## âœ… 2ë‹¨ê³„: ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œ ì˜ˆì‹œ (ì˜ì—­ ì„ íƒ + íŠ¸ë ˆì´ ì•„ì´ì½˜)

```python
import pyautogui
import tkinter as tk
from PIL import ImageGrab
from pystray import Icon, MenuItem, Menu
from threading import Thread
import sys
import os
from datetime import datetime
from PIL import Image

save_dir = "captures"
os.makedirs(save_dir, exist_ok=True)

class SnippingTool:
    def __init__(self):
        self.start_x = None
        self.start_y = None
        self.rect = None

    def on_mouse_down(self, event):
        self.start_x = event.x
        self.start_y = event.y
        self.rect = self.canvas.create_rectangle(self.start_x, self.start_y, self.start_x, self.start_y, outline='red', width=2)

    def on_mouse_move(self, event):
        if self.rect:
            self.canvas.coords(self.rect, self.start_x, self.start_y, event.x, event.y)

    def on_mouse_up(self, event):
        x1 = self.root.winfo_rootx() + self.start_x
        y1 = self.root.winfo_rooty() + self.start_y
        x2 = self.root.winfo_rootx() + event.x
        y2 = self.root.winfo_rooty() + event.y

        self.root.destroy()

        img = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(x1, y1, x2, y2))
        timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
        filepath = os.path.join(save_dir, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
        img.save(filepath)
        print(f"[âœ“] ì €ì¥ë¨: {filepath}")

    def run(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.attributes('-fullscreen', True)
        self.root.attributes('-alpha', 0.3)
        self.root.configure(background='black')
        self.root.bind('<Escape>', lambda e: self.root.destroy())

        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(self.root, cursor="cross", bg='black')
        self.canvas.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

        self.canvas.bind('<Button-1>', self.on_mouse_down)
        self.canvas.bind('<B1-Motion>', self.on_mouse_move)
        self.canvas.bind('<ButtonRelease-1>', self.on_mouse_up)

        self.root.mainloop()

def capture_action(icon, item):
    snip = SnippingTool()
    snip.run()

def exit_action(icon, item):
    icon.stop()
    sys.exit()

def create_tray_icon():
    image = Image.new('RGB', (64, 64), color='blue')  # íŠ¸ë ˆì´ ì•„ì´ì½˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ (ì»¤ìŠ¤í…€ ê°€ëŠ¥)
    menu = Menu(MenuItem('ìº¡ì²˜í•˜ê¸°', capture_action), MenuItem('ì¢…ë£Œ', exit_action))
    icon = Icon("ë•ì‚°ìº¡ì²˜ë„êµ¬", image, "ë•ì‚° ìº¡ì²˜", menu)
    icon

ì¢‹ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤ ë•ì‚° ë‹˜!  
ë•ì‚° ë‹˜ê»˜ ê¼­ ë§ëŠ” **"ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ë¡œ ë“œë˜ê·¸í•˜ì—¬ ì˜ì—­ ìº¡ì²˜ + ì‘ì—…í‘œì‹œì¤„ ì•„ì´ì½˜"** í˜•íƒœì˜ **íŒŒì´ì¬ ìŠ¤í¬ë¦° ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬**ë¥¼ ì•„ë˜ì²˜ëŸ¼ ì„¤ê³„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

| ğŸ“‚ ìë™ ì €ì¥ | íŒŒì¼ëª…ì— ë‚ ì§œ í¬í•¨, í´ë”ì— ì €ì¥ |
| ğŸ§² ì‘ì—…í‘œì‹œì¤„ ì•„ì´ì½˜ ìœ ì§€ | ì¢…ë£Œë˜ì§€ ì•Šê³  ë°±ê·¸ë¼ìš´ë“œ ìƒì£¼ |

## âœ… 2ë‹¨ê³„: ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œ ì˜ˆì‹œ (ì‘ì—…í‘œì‹œì¤„ ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬)

```python
import pyautogui
import tkinter as tk
from PIL import Image, ImageGrab, ImageDraw
from pystray import Icon, MenuItem, Menu
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime
import sys

SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)

def capture_area():
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.attributes('-fullscreen', True)
    root.attributes('-alpha', 0.3)
    root.configure(bg='black')

    start_x = start_y = cur_x = cur_y = 0
    canvas = tk.Canvas(root, cursor="cross", bg='gray', highlightthickness=0)
    canvas.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

    def on_mouse_down(event):
        nonlocal start_x, start_y
        start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y

    def on_mouse_drag(event):
        nonlocal cur_x, cur_y
        cur_x, cur_y = event.x, event.y
        canvas.delete("rect")
        canvas.create_rectangle(start_x, start_y, cur_x, cur_y, outline='red', width=2, tags="rect")

    def on_mouse_up(event):
        x1 = root.winfo_rootx() + min(start_x, cur_x)
        y1 = root.winfo_rooty() + min(start_y, cur_y)
        x2 = root.winfo_rootx() + max(start_x, cur_x)
        y2 = root.winfo_rooty() + max(start_y, cur_y)
        root.destroy()
        image = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(x1, y1, x2, y2))
        timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
        filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
        image.save(filepath)
        print(f"[âœ“] ìº¡ì²˜ ì €ì¥ ì™„ë£Œ: {filepath}")

    canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_mouse_down)
    canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_mouse_drag)
    canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_mouse_up)

    root.mainloop()

def run_capture():
    threading.Thread(target=capture_area).start()

def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))

def quit_program(icon, item):
    icon.stop()
    sys.exit()

def setup_tray_icon():
    image = Image.new("RGB", (64, 64), color=(50, 50, 50))
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(image)
    draw.rectangle((16, 16, 48, 48), fill="white")

    menu = Menu(

## âœ… ë•ì‚° í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬ v1 â€“ ë“œë˜ê·¸ ìº¡ì²˜ + í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬

```python
import pyautogui
import tkinter as tk
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw
import win32clipboard
import os
from datetime import datetime

SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]  # BMP í—¤ë” ì œê±°
    output.close()

    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

def capture_area():
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.attributes('-fullscreen', True)
    root.attributes('-alpha', 0.3)
    root.configure(bg='black')

    canvas = tk.Canvas(root, cursor="cross", bg='gray', highlightthickness=0)
    canvas.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

    start_x = start_y = cur_x = cur_y = 0

    def on_mouse_down(event):
        nonlocal start_x, start_y
        start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y

    def on_mouse_drag(event):
        nonlocal cur_x, cur_y
        cur_x, cur_y = event.x, event.y
        canvas.delete("rect")
        canvas.create_rectangle(start_x, start_y, cur_x, cur_y, outline='red', width=2, tags="rect")

    def on_mouse_up(event):
        x1 = root.winfo_rootx() + min(start_x, cur_x)
        y1 = root.winfo_rooty() + min(start_y, cur_y)
        x2 = root.winfo_rootx() + max(start_x, cur_x)
        y2 = root.winfo_rooty() + max(start_y, cur_y)
        root.destroy()

        image = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(x1, y1, x2, y2))
        timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
        filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
        image.save(filepath)
        image_to_clipboard(image)  # í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬
        print(f"[âœ“] ìº¡ì²˜ ì €ì¥ ë° í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬ ì™„ë£Œ: {filepath}")

    canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_mouse_down)
    canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_mouse_drag)

## âœ… ğŸ’» ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œ: `ë•ì‚°ë„êµ¬.py`

```python
import pyautogui
import tkinter as tk
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw
from pystray import Icon, MenuItem, Menu
import win32clipboard
import pytesseract
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime
import sys

SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)

# Tesseract ê²½ë¡œ (í•„ìš” ì‹œ ìˆ˜ì •)
pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = r"C:\Program Files\Tesseract-OCR\tesseract.exe"

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

def capture_area():
    def _run():
        root = tk.Tk()
        root.attributes('-fullscreen', True)
        root.attributes('-alpha', 0.3)
        root.configure(bg='black')

        canvas = tk.Canvas(root, cursor="cross", bg='gray', highlightthickness=0)
        canvas.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

        start_x = start_y = cur_x = cur_y = 0

        def on_mouse_down(event):
            nonlocal start_x, start_y
            start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y

        def on_mouse_drag(event):
            nonlocal cur_x, cur_y
            cur_x, cur_y = event.x, event.y
            canvas.delete("rect")
            canvas.create_rectangle(start_x, start_y, cur_x, cur_y, outline='red', width=2, tags="rect")

        def on_mouse_up(event):
            x1 = root.winfo_rootx() + min(start_x, cur_x)
            y1 = root.winfo_rooty() + min(start_y, cur_y)
            x2 = root.winfo_rootx() + max(start_x, cur_x)
            y2 = root.winfo_rooty() + max(start_y, cur_y)
            root.destroy()
            image = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(x1, y1, x2, y2))
            timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
            filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
            image.save(filepath)
            image_to_clipboard(image)
            print(f"[âœ“] ì €ì¥ ë° ë³µì‚¬: {filepath}")

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_mouse_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_mouse_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_mouse_up)
        root.mainloop()

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith(".png")],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            print("[!] ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        print(f"[ğŸ§ ] í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ ì™„ë£Œ â†’ {txt_path}")
        os.startfile(txt_path)
    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))

def quit_program(icon, item):
    icon.stop()
    sys.exit()

def setup_tray_icon():
    image = Image.new("RGB", (64, 64), color=(40, 40, 40))
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(image)
    draw.rectangle((16, 16, 48, 48), fill="white")

    menu = Menu(
        MenuItem("ğŸ“¸ í™”ë©´ ì˜ì—­ ìº¡ì²˜", lambda: capture_area()),
        MenuItem("ğŸ§  OCR í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ", lambda: extract_text_from_latest()),
        MenuItem("ğŸ“‚ ìº¡ì²˜ í´ë” ì—´ê¸°", lambda: open_folder()),
        MenuItem("âŒ ì¢…ë£Œ", quit_program)
    )

    icon = Icon("ë•ì‚°ë„êµ¬", image, "ë•ì‚° í™”ë©´ë„êµ¬", menu)
    icon.run()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    setup_tray_icon()
```

## âœ… ì‘ë™ ë°©ì‹ ì˜ˆì‹œ

1. í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜ ì‹¤í–‰ (`ì‘ì—…í‘œì‹œì¤„ ë©”ë‰´ â†’ í™”ë©´ ì˜ì—­ ìº¡ì²˜`)

## âœ… êµ¬í˜„ëœ ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œ (`ë•ì‚°ë„êµ¬_v4.py`)

```python
import pyautogui
import tkinter as tk
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw
from pystray import Icon, MenuItem, Menu
import win32clipboard
import pytesseract
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime
import sys

SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)
pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = r"C:\Program Files\Tesseract-OCR\tesseract.exe"

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

def capture_and_annotate():
    def _run():
        root = tk.Tk()
        root.attributes('-fullscreen', True)
        root.attributes('-alpha', 0.3)
        root.configure(bg='black')
        canvas = tk.Canvas(root, cursor="cross", bg='gray', highlightthickness=0)
        canvas.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

        start_x = start_y = cur_x = cur_y = 0

        def on_mouse_down(event):
            nonlocal start_x, start_y
            start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y

        def on_mouse_drag(event):
            nonlocal cur_x, cur_y
            cur_x, cur_y = event.x, event.y
            canvas.delete("rect")
            canvas.create_rectangle(start_x, start_y, cur_x, cur_y, outline='red', width=2, tags="rect")

        def on_mouse_up(event):
            x1 = root.winfo_rootx() + min(start_x, cur_x)
            y1 = root.winfo_rooty() + min(start_y, cur_y)
            x2 = root.winfo_rootx() + max(start_x, cur_x)
            y2 = root.winfo_rooty() + max(start_y, cur_y)
            root.destroy()

            # 1ì°¨ ìº¡ì²˜
            image = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(x1, y1, x2, y2))
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(image)

            # 2ì°¨ ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡° ì„ íƒ
            def annotate_question():
                ann = tk.Tk()
                ann.geometry(f"{x2 - x1}x{y2 - y1}+{x1}+{y1}")
                ann.attributes('-topmost', True)
                canvas2 = tk.Canvas(ann, cursor="tcross", bg='white', highlightthickness=0)
                canvas2.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

                qs_x = qs_y = qe_x = qe_y = 0

                def on_drag_start(evt):
                    nonlocal qs_x, qs_y
                    qs_x, qs_y = evt.x, evt.y

                def on_drag_move(evt):
                    nonlocal qe_x, qe_y
                    qe_x, qe_y = evt.x, evt.y
                    canvas2.delete("highlight")
                    canvas2.create_rectangle(qs_x, qs_y, qe_x, qe_y, outline="red", width=2, tags="highlight")

                def on_drag_end(evt):
                    ann.destroy()
                    draw.rectangle(
                        (min(qs_x, qe_x), min(qs_y, qe_y), max(qs_x, qe_x), max(qs_y, qe_y)),
                        outline="red", width=3
                    )
                    save_and_copy(image)

                canvas2.bind("<Button-1>", on_drag_start)
                canvas2.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag_move)
                canvas2.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_drag_end)

                ann.mainloop()

            annotate_question()

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_mouse_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_mouse_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_mouse_up)

        root.mainloop()

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
    image.save(filepath)
    image_to_clipboard(image)
    print(f"[âœ“] ì €ì¥ ë° í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬ ì™„ë£Œ: {filepath}")

def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith(".png")],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            print("[!] ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ì—†ìŒ.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        print(f"[ğŸ§ ] í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ ì™„ë£Œ â†’ {txt_path}")
        os.startfile(txt_path)
    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))

def quit_program(icon, item):
    icon.stop()
    sys.exit()

def setup_tray_icon():
    image = Image.new("RGB", (64, 64), color=(30, 30, 30))
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(image)

## âœ… ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œ: `dkcapture_gui.py`

```python
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import messagebox
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw
import win32clipboard
import pytesseract
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime

SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)
pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = r"C:\Program Files\Tesseract-OCR\tesseract.exe"

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
    image.save(filepath)
    image_to_clipboard(image)
    print(f"[âœ“] ì €ì¥ ë° í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬ ì™„ë£Œ: {filepath}")

def capture_and_annotate():
    def _run():
        root = tk.Tk()
        root.attributes('-fullscreen', True)
        root.attributes('-alpha', 0.3)
        root.configure(bg='black')
        canvas = tk.Canvas(root, cursor="cross", bg='gray', highlightthickness=0)
        canvas.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

        start_x = start_y = cur_x = cur_y = 0

        def on_mouse_down(event):
            nonlocal start_x, start_y
            start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y

        def on_mouse_drag(event):
            nonlocal cur_x, cur_y
            cur_x, cur_y = event.x, event.y
            canvas.delete("rect")
            canvas.create_rectangle(start_x, start_y, cur_x, cur_y, outline='red', width=2, tags="rect")

        def on_mouse_up(event):
            x1 = root.winfo_rootx() + min(start_x, cur_x)
            y1 = root.winfo_rooty() + min(start_y, cur_y)
            x2 = root.winfo_rootx() + max(start_x, cur_x)
            y2 = root.winfo_rooty() + max(start_y, cur_y)
            root.destroy()

            image = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(x1, y1, x2, y2))
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(image)

            def annotate_question():
                ann = tk.Tk()
                ann.geometry(f"{x2 - x1}x{y2 - y1}+{x1}+{y1}")
                ann.attributes('-topmost', True)
                canvas2 = tk.Canvas(ann, cursor="tcross", bg='white', highlightthickness=0)
                canvas2.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

                qs_x = qs_y = qe_x = qe_y = 0

                def on_drag_start(evt):
                    nonlocal qs_x, qs_y
                    qs_x, qs_y = evt.x, evt.y

                def on_drag_move(evt):
                    nonlocal qe_x, qe_y
                    qe_x, qe_y = evt.x, evt.y
                    canvas2.delete("highlight")
                    canvas2.create_rectangle(qs_x, qs_y, qe_x, qe_y, outline="red", width=2, tags="highlight")

                def on_drag_end(evt):
                    ann.destroy()
                    draw.rectangle(
                        (min(qs_x, qe_x), min(qs_y, qe_y), max(qs_x, qe_x), max(qs_y, qe_y)),
                        outline="red", width=3
                    )
                    save_and_copy(image)

                canvas2.bind("<Button-1>", on_drag_start)
                canvas2.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag_move)
                canvas2.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_drag_end)
                ann.mainloop()

            annotate_question()

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_mouse_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_mouse_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_mouse_up)

        root.mainloop()

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith(".png")],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            messagebox.showinfo("ì•ˆë‚´", "ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        os.startfile(txt_path)
    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))

## âœ… ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëœ ê°•ì¡°ê¸°ëŠ¥ í•µì‹¬ ì˜ˆì‹œ (ë¶€ë¶„ ì½”ë“œ)

```python
def annotate_question_on_image(image: Image.Image):
    def _run():
        ann = tk.Tk()
        ann.title("ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡°í•  ì˜ì—­ì„ ì„ íƒí•˜ì„¸ìš”")

        w, h = image.size
        ann.geometry(f"{w}x{h}+100+100")
        ann.resizable(False, False)

        # ğŸ–¼ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ í‘œì‹œ
        img_tk = ImageTk.PhotoImage(image)
        canvas = tk.Canvas(ann, width=w, height=h, cursor="tcross")
        canvas.pack()
        canvas.create_image(0, 0, image=img_tk, anchor="nw")

        qs_x = qs_y = qe_x = qe_y = 0

        def on_drag_start(evt):
            nonlocal qs_x, qs_y
            qs_x, qs_y = evt.x, evt.y

        def on_drag_move(evt):
            nonlocal qe_x, qe_y
            qe_x, qe_y = evt.x, evt.y
            canvas.delete("highlight")
            canvas.create_rectangle(qs_x, qs_y, qe_x, qe_y, outline="red", width=2, tags="highlight")

        def on_drag_end(evt):
            ann.destroy()
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(image)
            draw.rectangle(
                (min(qs_x, qe_x), min(qs_y, qe_y), max(qs_x, qe_x), max(qs_y, qe_y)),
                outline="red", width=3
            )
            save_and_copy(image)

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_drag_start)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag_move)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_drag_end)

        ann.mainloop()

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()
```

> ğŸ“Œ `ImageTk.PhotoImage()`ë¥¼ í™œìš©í•´ ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ê·¸ëŒ€ë¡œ GUIì— í‘œì‹œí•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ í•µì‹¬ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

## â­ï¸ ì›í•˜ì‹œë©´ ì§€ê¸ˆ ë°”ë¡œ ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œì— ë°˜ì˜í•´ ë“œë¦´ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

from tkinter import messagebox
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw, ImageTk
import win32clipboard
import pytesseract
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime

# ì €ì¥ í´ë” ìƒì„±
SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)

# Tesseract ê²½ë¡œ ì„¤ì • (í•„ìš” ì‹œ ìˆ˜ì •)
pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = r"C:\Program Files\Tesseract-OCR\tesseract.exe"

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()


def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
    image.save(filepath)
    image_to_clipboard(image)
    messagebox.showinfo("ì™„ë£Œ", f"ì €ì¥ ë° í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬ ì™„ë£Œ:\n{filepath}")


# 1. ìº¡ì²˜ ë° ì§ì ‘ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ìœ„ì— ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡°í•˜ê¸°
def capture_and_annotate():
    def _run():
        # ì „ì²´ í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜
        img = ImageGrab.grab()
        # ê°•ì¡° ì°½ ì¤€ë¹„
        ann = tk.Tk()
        ann.title("ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡° - ë“œë˜ê·¸ë¡œ ì˜ì—­ ì„ íƒ")
        w, h = img.size
        ann.geometry(f"{w}x{h}+0+0")
        ann.attributes("-topmost", True)

        canvas = tk.Canvas(ann, width=w, height=h, cursor="tcross")
        canvas.pack()
        img_tk = ImageTk.PhotoImage(img)
        canvas.create_image(0, 0, image=img_tk, anchor="nw")

        qs_x = qs_y = qe_x = qe_y = 0
        
        def on_down(event):
            nonlocal qs_x, qs_y
            qs_x, qs_y = event.x, event.y

        def on_drag(event):
            nonlocal qe_x, qe_y
            qe_x, qe_y = event.x, event.y
            canvas.delete("highlight")
            canvas.create_rectangle(qs_x, qs_y, qe_x, qe_y, outline="red", width=2, tags="highlight")

        def on_up(event):
            nonlocal img
            ann.destroy()
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
            draw.rectangle((qs_x, qs_y, qe_x, qe_y), outline="red", width=3)
            save_and_copy(img)

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_up)
        ann.mainloop()

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()


# 2. OCR í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ
def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith('.png')],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            messagebox.showinfo("ì•ˆë‚´", "ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        os.startfile(txt_path)

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()


# 3. ìº¡ì²˜ í´ë” ì—´ê¸°
def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))


# GUI ì‹¤í–‰ í•¨ìˆ˜
def launch_gui():
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.title("ë•ì‚° ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬")

    # ì°½ í¬ê¸° ë° ì¤‘ì•™ ë°°ì¹˜
    width, height = 360, 320
    sw, sh = root.winfo_screenwidth(), root.winfo_screenheight()
    x, y = (sw - width) // 2, (sh - height) // 2
    root.geometry(f"{width}x{height}+{x}+{y}")
    root.resizable(False, False)
    root.attributes("-topmost", True)

    # íƒ€ì´í‹€
    tk.Label(root, text="ğŸ ë•ì‚° ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬", font=("ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", 16, "bold")).pack(pady=15)

    # ë²„íŠ¼
    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ“¸ í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜ + ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡°", command=capture_and_annotate, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ§  OCR í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ", command=extract_text_from_latest, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ“‚ ìº¡ì²˜ í´ë” ì—´ê¸°", command=open_folder, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="âŒ ì¢…ë£Œ", command=root.destroy, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=10)

    root.mainloop()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    launch_gui()"}

def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):

# 1. ìº¡ì²˜ ë° ì§ì ‘ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ìœ„ì— ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡°í•˜ê¸°
def capture_and_annotate():
    def _run():
        # ì „ì²´ í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜
        img = ImageGrab.grab()
        tmp_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "_temp_capture.png")
        img.save(tmp_path)

        # ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ë‹¤ì‹œ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° (íˆ¬ëª…ë„ ë¬¸ì œ ë°©ì§€)
        img = Image.open(tmp_path)

        # ê°•ì¡° ì°½ ì¤€ë¹„
        ann = tk.Tk()
        ann.title("ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡° - ë“œë˜ê·¸ë¡œ ì˜ì—­ ì„ íƒ")
        w, h = img.size
        ann.geometry(f"{w}x{h}+0+0")
        ann.attributes("-topmost", True)

        canvas = tk.Canvas(ann, width=w, height=h, cursor="tcross")
        canvas.pack()

        img_tk = ImageTk.PhotoImage(img)
        canvas.image = img_tk  # ì°¸ì¡° ìœ ì§€ ë°©ì§€
        canvas.create_image(0, 0, image=img_tk, anchor="nw")

        rect = None
        start_x = start_y = 0

        def on_down(event):
            nonlocal start_x, start_y, rect
            start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y
            if rect:
                canvas.delete(rect)
            rect = canvas.create_rectangle(start_x, start_y, start_x, start_y, outline="red", width=2)

        def on_drag(event):
            nonlocal rect
            canvas.coords(rect, start_x, start_y, event.x, event.y)

        def on_up(event):
            x1, y1, x2, y2 = canvas.coords(rect)
            ann.destroy()
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
            draw.rectangle([x1, y1, x2, y2], outline="red", width=3)
            save_and_copy(img)

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_up)
        ann.mainloop()

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith('.png')],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            messagebox.showinfo("ì•ˆë‚´", "ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        os.startfile(txt_path)

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import messagebox
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw
import win32clipboard
import pytesseract
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime

SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)
pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = r"C:\Program Files\Tesseract-OCR\tesseract.exe"

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
    image.save(filepath)
    image_to_clipboard(image)
    print(f"[âœ“] ì €ì¥ ë° í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬ ì™„ë£Œ: {filepath}")

def capture_and_annotate():
    def _run():
        root = tk.Tk()
        root.attributes('-fullscreen', True)
        root.attributes('-alpha', 0.3)
        root.configure(bg='black')
        canvas = tk.Canvas(root, cursor="cross", bg='gray', highlightthickness=0)
        canvas.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

        start_x = start_y = cur_x = cur_y = 0

        def on_mouse_down(event):
            nonlocal start_x, start_y
            start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y

        def on_mouse_drag(event):
            nonlocal cur_x, cur_y
            cur_x, cur_y = event.x, event.y
            canvas.delete("rect")
            canvas.create_rectangle(start_x, start_y, cur_x, cur_y, outline='red', width=2, tags="rect")

        def on_mouse_up(event):
            x1 = root.winfo_rootx() + min(start_x, cur_x)
            y1 = root.winfo_rooty() + min(start_y, cur_y)
            x2 = root.winfo_rootx() + max(start_x, cur_x)
            y2 = root.winfo_rooty() + max(start_y, cur_y)
            root.destroy()

            image = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(x1, y1, x2, y2))
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(image)

            def annotate_question():
                ann = tk.Tk()
                ann.geometry(f"{x2 - x1}x{y2 - y1}+{x1}+{y1}")
                ann.attributes('-topmost', True)
                canvas2 = tk.Canvas(ann, cursor="tcross", bg='white', highlightthickness=0)
                canvas2.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True)

                qs_x = qs_y = qe_x = qe_y = 0

                def on_drag_start(evt):
                    nonlocal qs_x, qs_y
                    qs_x, qs_y = evt.x, evt.y

                def on_drag_move(evt):
                    nonlocal qe_x, qe_y
                    qe_x, qe_y = evt.x, evt.y
                    canvas2.delete("highlight")
                    canvas2.create_rectangle(qs_x, qs_y, qe_x, qe_y, outline="red", width=2, tags="highlight")

                def on_drag_end(evt):
                    ann.destroy()
                    draw.rectangle(
                        (min(qs_x, qe_x), min(qs_y, qe_y), max(qs_x, qe_x), max(qs_y, qe_y)),
                        outline="red", width=3
                    )
                    save_and_copy(image)

                canvas2.bind("<Button-1>", on_drag_start)
                canvas2.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag_move)
                canvas2.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_drag_end)
                ann.mainloop()

            annotate_question()

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_mouse_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_mouse_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_mouse_up)

        root.mainloop()

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith(".png")],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            messagebox.showinfo("ì•ˆë‚´", "ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        os.startfile(txt_path)
    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))

# === GUI ì°½ ë§Œë“¤ê¸° ===
def launch_gui():
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.title("ë•ì‚° ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬")
    root.geometry("300x240")
    root.resizable(False, False)

    title = tk.Label(root, text="ğŸ ë•ì‚° ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬", font=("ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", 16, "bold"))
    title.pack(pady=15)

    btn1 = tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ“¸ í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜ + ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡°", command=capture_and_annotate, height=2)
    btn1.pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)

    btn2 = tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ§  OCR í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ", command=extract_text_from_latest, height=2)
    btn2.pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)

    btn3 = tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ“‚ ìº¡ì²˜ í´ë” ì—´ê¸°", command=open_folder, height=2)
    btn3.pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)

    btn4 = tk.Button(root, text="âŒ ì¢…ë£Œ", command=root.destroy, height=2)
    btn4.pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=10)

    root.mainloop()

if __name__ == "__main__":

ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œê°€ ì–´ë”” ìˆì–´?

import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import messagebox
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw, ImageTk
import win32clipboard
import pytesseract
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime

# ì €ì¥ í´ë” ìƒì„±
SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)

# Tesseract ê²½ë¡œ ì„¤ì • (í•„ìš” ì‹œ ìˆ˜ì •)
pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = r"C:\\Program Files\\Tesseract-OCR\\tesseract.exe"

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
    image.save(filepath)
    image_to_clipboard(image)
    messagebox.showinfo("ì™„ë£Œ", f"ì €ì¥ ë° í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬ ì™„ë£Œ:\n{filepath}")

# 1. ìº¡ì²˜ ë° ì§ì ‘ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ìœ„ì— ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡°í•˜ê¸°
def capture_and_annotate():
    def _run():
        # ì „ì²´ í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜
        img = ImageGrab.grab()
        tmp_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "_temp_capture.png")
        img.save(tmp_path)

        # ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ë‹¤ì‹œ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° (íˆ¬ëª…ë„ ë¬¸ì œ ë°©ì§€)
        img = Image.open(tmp_path)

        # ê°•ì¡° ì°½ ì¤€ë¹„
        ann = tk.Tk()
        ann.title("ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡° - ë“œë˜ê·¸ë¡œ ì˜ì—­ ì„ íƒ")
        w, h = img.size
        ann.geometry(f"{w}x{h}+0+0")
        ann.attributes("-topmost", True)

        canvas = tk.Canvas(ann, width=w, height=h, cursor="tcross")
        canvas.pack()

        img_tk = ImageTk.PhotoImage(img)
        canvas.image = img_tk  # ì°¸ì¡° ìœ ì§€ ë°©ì§€
        canvas.create_image(0, 0, image=img_tk, anchor="nw")

        rect = None
        start_x = start_y = 0

        def on_down(event):
            nonlocal start_x, start_y, rect
            start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y
            if rect:
                canvas.delete(rect)
            rect = canvas.create_rectangle(start_x, start_y, start_x, start_y, outline="red", width=2)

        def on_drag(event):
            nonlocal rect
            canvas.coords(rect, start_x, start_y, event.x, event.y)

        def on_up(event):
            x1, y1, x2, y2 = canvas.coords(rect)
            ann.destroy()
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
            draw.rectangle([x1, y1, x2, y2], outline="red", width=3)
            save_and_copy(img)

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_up)
        ann.mainloop()

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

# 2. OCR í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ
def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith('.png')],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            messagebox.showinfo("ì•ˆë‚´", "ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        os.startfile(txt_path)

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

# 3. ìº¡ì²˜ í´ë” ì—´ê¸°
def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))

# GUI ì‹¤í–‰ í•¨ìˆ˜
def launch_gui():
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.title("ë•ì‚° ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬")

    width, height = 360, 320
    sw, sh = root.winfo_screenwidth(), root.winfo_screenheight()
    x, y = (sw - width) // 2, (sh - height) // 2
    root.geometry(f"{width}x{height}+{x}+{y}")
    root.resizable(False, False)
    root.attributes("-topmost", True)

    tk.Label(root, text="ğŸ ë•ì‚° ìº¡ì²˜ ë„êµ¬", font=("ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", 16, "bold")).pack(pady=15)

    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ“¸ í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜ + ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡°", command=capture_and_annotate, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ§  OCR í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ", command=extract_text_from_latest, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ“‚ ìº¡ì²˜ í´ë” ì—´ê¸°", command=open_folder, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="âŒ ì¢…ë£Œ", command=root.destroy, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=10)

    root.mainloop()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    launch_gui()
```

def capture_and_annotate():
    # ì „ì²´ í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì²˜
    img = ImageGrab.grab()
    tmp_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "_temp_capture.png")
    img.save(tmp_path)

    ann = tk.Tk()

    canvas.create_image(0, 0, image=img_tk, anchor="nw")

        start_x, start_y = event.x, event.y

from tkinter import messagebox
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw, ImageTk
import win32clipboard

SAVE_DIR = "captures"

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):

    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()

def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):

class SnippingTool(tk.Toplevel):
    def __init__(self, callback):
        super().__init__()
        self.callback = callback
        self.attributes("-fullscreen", True)
        self.attributes("-alpha", 0.3)
        self.configure(bg='black')
        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(self, cursor="cross")
        self.canvas.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
        self.start_x = self.start_y = self.rect = None
        self.bind_events()

    def bind_events(self):
        self.canvas.bind("<Button-1>", self.on_down)

def capture_and_annotate():

def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith('.png')],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True

        if not files:
            messagebox.showinfo("ì•ˆë‚´", "ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        os.startfile(txt_path)

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def capture_and_annotate():
    def after_capture(img):
        tmp_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "_temp_capture.png")
        img.save(tmp_path)
        ann = tk.Toplevel()
        ann.title("ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡° - ì˜ì—­ ë˜ëŠ” ì„  ì„ íƒ")
        w, h = img.size
        ann.geometry(f"{w}x{h}+0+0")
        ann.attributes("-topmost", True)

        canvas = tk.Canvas(ann, width=w, height=h, cursor="tcross")
        canvas.pack()

        img_tk = ImageTk.PhotoImage(img)
        canvas.image = img_tk
        canvas.img_ref = img_tk
        canvas.create_image(0, 0, image=img_tk, anchor="nw")

        drawing = {'mode': 'rectangle'}  # ë˜ëŠ” 'line', 'free'
        current = {'shape': None, 'x': 0, 'y': 0}

        def set_mode_rectangle():
            drawing['mode'] = 'rectangle'

        def set_mode_line():
            drawing['mode'] = 'line'

        def set_mode_free():
            drawing['mode'] = 'free'

        def on_down(event):
            current['x'], current['y'] = event.x, event.y
            if drawing['mode'] == 'rectangle':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_rectangle(event.x, event.y, event.x, event.y, outline="red", width=2)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'line':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_line(event.x, event.y, event.x, event.y, fill="red", width=2)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_line(event.x, event.y, event.x+1, event.y+1, fill="red", width=2, smooth=True)

        def on_drag(event):
            if not current['shape']: return
            if drawing['mode'] in ['rectangle', 'line']:
                canvas.coords(current['shape'], current['x'], current['y'], event.x, event.y)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                coords = canvas.coords(current['shape'])
                coords.extend([event.x, event.y])
                canvas.coords(current['shape'], *coords)

        def on_up(event):
            ann.destroy()
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
            if drawing['mode'] == 'rectangle':
                x1, y1, x2, y2 = canvas.coords(current['shape'])
                draw.rectangle([x1, y1, x2, y2], outline="red", width=3)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'line':
                x1, y1, x2, y2 = canvas.coords(current['shape'])
                draw.line([x1, y1, x2, y2], fill="red", width=3)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                coords = canvas.coords(current['shape'])
                draw.line(coords, fill="red", width=3)
            save_and_copy(img)

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_up)

class SnippingTool(tk.Toplevel):
    def __init__(self, callback):

    def after_capture(img):

            drawing['mode'] = 'free'

        def on_down(event):
            current['x'], current['y'] = event.x, event.y
            if drawing['mode'] == 'rectangle':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_rectangle(event.x, event.y, event.x, event.y, outline="red", width=2)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'line':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_line(event.x, event.y, event.x, event.y, fill="red", width=2)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_line(event.x, event.y, event.x+1, event.y+1, fill="red", width=2, smooth=True)

        def on_drag(event):
            if not current['shape']: return

                canvas.coords(current['shape'], current['x'], current['y'], event.x, event.y)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                coords = canvas.coords(current['shape'])
                coords.extend([event.x, event.y])
                canvas.coords(current['shape'], *coords)

        def on_up(event):

                draw.line([x1, y1, x2, y2], fill="red", width=3)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                coords = canvas.coords(current['shape'])
                draw.line(coords, fill="red", width=3)
            save_and_copy(img)

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag)
        canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", on_up)

        ann.mainloop()

    SnippingTool(after_capture)

class SnippingTool(tk.Toplevel):
    def __init__(self, callback):
        super().__init__()
        self.callback = callback
        self.attributes("-fullscreen", True)

        self.after(100, lambda: self.capture_area(x1, y1, x2, y2))

            drawing['mode'] = 'rectangle'
            drawing['color'] = tool_colors['rectangle']

        def set_mode_line():
            drawing['mode'] = 'line'
            drawing['color'] = tool_colors['line']

        def set_mode_free():
            drawing['mode'] = 'free'
            drawing['color'] = tool_colors['free']

        def choose_color():
            color = colorchooser.askcolor(title="í˜„ì¬ ë„êµ¬ ìƒ‰ìƒ ì„ íƒ")[1]
            if color:
                current_tool = drawing['mode']
                tool_colors[current_tool] = color
                drawing['color'] = color
                update_button_colors()

        def update_button_colors():
            btn_rect.config(bg=tool_colors['rectangle'])
            btn_line.config(bg=tool_colors['line'])
            btn_free.config(bg=tool_colors['free'])

        def done():
            canvas.postscript(file=os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "annotated.ps"))  # optional save backup
            save_and_copy(img)
            ann.destroy()

        def cancel():
            ann.destroy()

        btn_rect = tk.Button(btn_frame, text="ğŸŸ¥ ì˜ì—­", font=button_font, command=set_mode_rectangle, height=2, width=12)
        btn_line = tk.Button(btn_frame, text="â– ì§ì„ ", font=button_font, command=set_mode_line, height=2, width=12)
        btn_free = tk.Button(btn_frame, text="âœï¸ ììœ ", font=button_font, command=set_mode_free, height=2, width=12)

        btn_rect.pack(side="left", **button_pad)
        btn_line.pack(side="left", **button_pad)
        btn_free.pack(side="left", **button_pad)

        tk.Button(btn_frame, text="ğŸ¨ ìƒ‰ìƒ ì„ íƒ", font=button_font, command=choose_color, height=2, width=14).pack(side="left", **button_pad)
        tk.Button(btn_frame, text="ğŸ’¾ ì €ì¥ ë° ë³µì‚¬", font=button_font, command=done, height=2, width=16).pack(side="left", **button_pad)
        tk.Button(btn_frame, text="âŒ ì·¨ì†Œ", font=button_font, command=cancel, height=2, width=12).pack(side="left", **button_pad)

        update_button_colors()

        current = {'shape': None, 'x': 0, 'y': 0}

        def on_down(event):
            current['x'], current['y'] = event.x, event.y
            if drawing['mode'] == 'rectangle':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_rectangle(event.x, event.y, event.x, event.y, outline=drawing['color'], width=2)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'line':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_line(event.x, event.y, event.x, event.y, fill=drawing['color'], width=2)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_line(event.x, event.y, event.x+1, event.y+1, fill=drawing['color'], width=2, smooth=True)

        def on_drag(event):
            if not current['shape']: return
            if drawing['mode'] in ['rectangle', 'line']:
                canvas.coords(current['shape'], current['x'], current['y'], event.x, event.y)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                coords = canvas.coords(current['shape'])
                coords.extend([event.x, event.y])
                canvas.coords(current['shape'], *coords)

        canvas.bind("<Button-1>", on_down)
        canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", on_drag)

        ann.mainloop()

def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith('.png')],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            messagebox.showinfo("ì•ˆë‚´", "ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        os.startfile(txt_path)

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()

def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))

    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ“¸ í™”ë©´ ìº¡ì³ + ì§ˆë¬¸ ê°•ì¡°", command=capture_and_annotate, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ§  OCR í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ", command=extract_text_from_latest, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="ğŸ“‚ ìº¡ì³ í´ë” ì—´ê¸°", command=open_folder, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=5)
    tk.Button(root, text="âŒ ì¢…ë£Œ", command=root.destroy, height=2).pack(fill="x", padx=30, pady=10)

    root.mainloop()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    launch_gui()"
    }
  ]
}

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()

    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()

    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

class SnippingTool(tk.Toplevel):

        self.callback = callback

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
    image.save(filepath)
    image_to_clipboard(image)
    messagebox.showinfo("ì™„ë£Œ", f"ì €ì¥ ë° í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬ ì™„ë£Œ:\n{filepath}")

class SnippingTool(tk.Toplevel):
    def __init__(self, callback):
        super().__init__()
        self.callback = callback
        self.attributes("-fullscreen", True)
        self.attributes("-alpha", 0.3)
        self.configure(bg='black')
        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(self, cursor="cross")
        self.canvas.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
        self.start_x = self.start_y = self.rect = None
        self.bind_events()

    def bind_events(self):
        self.canvas.bind("<Button-1>", self.on_down)
        self.canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", self.on_drag)
        self.canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", self.on_up)

    def on_down(self, event):
        self.start_x, self.start_y = event.x, event.y
        if self.rect:
            self.canvas.delete(self.rect)
        self.rect = self.canvas.create_rectangle(self.start_x, self.start_y, self.start_x, self.start_y, outline="red", width=2)

    def on_drag(self, event):
        self.canvas.coords(self.rect, self.start_x, self.start_y, event.x, event.y)

    def on_up(self, event):
        try:
            x1, y1, x2, y2 = self.canvas.coords(self.rect)
        except Exception:
            return
        self.destroy()
        self.after(100, lambda: self.capture_area(x1, y1, x2, y2))

    def capture_area(self, x1, y1, x2, y2):
        img = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(x1, y1, x2, y2))
        self.callback(img)

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()

class SnippingTool(tk.Toplevel):
    def __init__(self, callback):
        super().__init__()
        self.callback = callback

        def show_color_palette(mode):

            palette.title(f"{mode} ìƒ‰ìƒ ì„ íƒ")
            palette.geometry("+%d+%d" % (ann.winfo_rootx() + 100, ann.winfo_rooty() + 60))
            palette.attributes("-topmost", True)
            palette.resizable(False, False)

            colors = ['#FF0000', '#00FF00', '#0000FF', '#FFFF00', '#FF00FF', '#00FFFF',
                      '#000000', '#808080', '#C0C0C0', '#FFFFFF']

            for i, color in enumerate(colors):

            entry.pack(fill="both", padx=10, pady=10)

            def confirm():
                text = entry.get()
                if text:

                    history.append(item)
                text_popup.destroy()

            tk.Button(text_popup, text="ì…ë ¥", command=confirm).pack(pady=5)

        btn_free = tk.Button(top_frame, text="âœï¸", font=button_font, command=lambda: set_mode('free'))
        btn_text = tk.Button(top_frame, text="T", font=button_font, command=lambda: set_mode('text'))

        for btn, mode in [(btn_rect, 'rectangle'), (btn_line, 'line'), (btn_free, 'free'), (btn_text, 'text')]:
            frame = tk.Frame(top_frame)
            btn.pack(in_=frame, side="top", **button_pad)
            tk.Button(frame, text="â–¼", font=("ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", 8), command=lambda m=mode: show_color_palette(m)).pack()
            frame.pack(side="left")

        tk.Button(top_frame, text="â†©ï¸", font=button_font, command=undo).pack(side="left", **button_pad)
        tk.Button(top_frame, text="â†ªï¸", font=button_font, command=redo).pack(side="left", **button_pad)
        tk.Button(top_frame, text="ğŸ’¾ ì €ì¥", font=button_font, command=done).pack(side="left", **button_pad)
        tk.Button(top_frame, text="âŒ", font=button_font, command=cancel).pack(side="left", **button_pad)

        update_button_colors()

        current = {'shape': None, 'x': 0, 'y': 0}

        def on_down(event):
            current['x'], current['y'] = event.x, event.y
            redo_stack.clear()
            if drawing['mode'] == 'rectangle':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_rectangle(event.x, event.y, event.x, event.y, outline=drawing['color'], width=2)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'line':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_line(event.x, event.y, event.x, event.y, fill=drawing['color'], width=2)
            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':
                current['shape'] = canvas.create_line(event.x, event.y, event.x+1, event.y+1, fill=drawing['color'], width=2, smooth=True)

            elif drawing['mode'] == 'free':

        def on_up(event):
            if current['shape']:
                history.append(current['shape'])

def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():

def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()

def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
    image.save(filepath)
    image_to_clipboard(image)

class SnippingTool(tk.Toplevel):
    def __init__(self, callback):
        super().__init__()
        self.callback = callback

        # ì „ì²´ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„° ì‚¬ì´ì¦ˆ ê³„ì‚°
        monitors = screeninfo.get_monitors()
        self.total_width = sum(m.width for m in monitors)
        self.max_height = max(m.height for m in monitors)

        self.geometry(f"{self.total_width}x{self.max_height}+0+0")
        self.attributes("-alpha", 0.3)
        self.configure(bg='black')
        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(self, cursor="cross")
        self.canvas.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
        self.start_x = self.start_y = self.rect = None
        self.bind_events()

    def bind_events(self):
        self.canvas.bind("<Button-1>", self.on_down)
        self.canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", self.on_drag)
        self.canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", self.on_up)

    def on_down(self, event):
        self.start_x, self.start_y = event.x, event.y
        if self.rect:
            self.canvas.delete(self.rect)
        self.rect = self.canvas.create_rectangle(self.start_x, self.start_y, self.start_x, self.start_y, outline="red", width=2)

    def on_drag(self, event):
        self.canvas.coords(self.rect, self.start_x, self.start_y, event.x, event.y)

    def on_up(self, event):
        try:
            x1, y1, x2, y2 = self.canvas.coords(self.rect)
        except Exception:
            return
        self.destroy()
        self.after(100, lambda: self.capture_area(x1, y1, x2, y2))

    def capture_area(self, x1, y1, x2, y2):
        left, top = min(x1, x2), min(y1, y2)
        right, bottom = max(x1, x2), max(y1, y2)
        img = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(left, top, right, bottom))

from tkinter import messagebox, colorchooser, simpledialog, ttk
from PIL import ImageGrab, Image, ImageDraw, ImageTk
import win32clipboard
import pytesseract
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime
import screeninfo  # ë‹¤ì¤‘ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„° ì§€ì›

SAVE_DIR = "captures"
os.makedirs(SAVE_DIR, exist_ok=True)

pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = r"C:\\Program Files\\Tesseract-OCR\\tesseract.exe"

COLOR_PALETTE = ["black", "red", "blue", "green", "yellow", "purple"]


def image_to_clipboard(image: Image.Image):
    import io
    output = io.BytesIO()
    image.convert("RGB").save(output, "BMP")
    data = output.getvalue()[14:]
    output.close()
    win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
    win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
    win32clipboard.SetClipboardData(win32clipboard.CF_DIB, data)
    win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()


def save_and_copy(image: Image.Image):
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    filepath = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f"capture_{timestamp}.png")
    image.save(filepath)
    image_to_clipboard(image)
    messagebox.showinfo("ì™„ë£Œ", f"ì €ì¥ ë° í´ë¦½ë³´ë“œ ë³µì‚¬ ì™„ë£Œ:\n{filepath}")
    open_annotation_window(image)


class SnippingTool(tk.Toplevel):
    def __init__(self, callback):
        super().__init__()
        self.callback = callback

        monitors = screeninfo.get_monitors()
        self.monitors = monitors

        self.total_width = sum(m.width for m in monitors)
        self.max_height = max(m.height for m in monitors)
        self.geometry(f"{self.total_width}x{self.max_height}+0+0")

        self.attributes("-alpha", 0.3)
        self.configure(bg='black')
        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(self, cursor="cross")
        self.canvas.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
        self.start_x = self.start_y = self.rect = None
        self.bind_events()

    def bind_events(self):
        self.canvas.bind("<Button-1>", self.on_down)
        self.canvas.bind("<B1-Motion>", self.on_drag)
        self.canvas.bind("<ButtonRelease-1>", self.on_up)

    def on_down(self, event):
        self.start_x, self.start_y = event.x, event.y
        if self.rect:
            self.canvas.delete(self.rect)
        self.rect = self.canvas.create_rectangle(self.start_x, self.start_y, self.start_x, self.start_y, outline="red", width=2)

    def on_drag(self, event):
        self.canvas.coords(self.rect, self.start_x, self.start_y, event.x, event.y)

    def on_up(self, event):
        try:
            x1, y1, x2, y2 = self.canvas.coords(self.rect)
        except Exception:
            return
        self.destroy()
        self.after(100, lambda: self.capture_area(x1, y1, x2, y2))

    def capture_area(self, x1, y1, x2, y2):
        left, top = min(x1, x2), min(y1, y2)
        right, bottom = max(x1, x2), max(y1, y2)
        img = ImageGrab.grab(bbox=(left, top, right, bottom))
        self.callback(img)


def extract_text_from_latest():
    def _run():
        files = sorted(
            [f for f in os.listdir(SAVE_DIR) if f.endswith('.png')],
            key=lambda f: os.path.getmtime(os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, f)),
            reverse=True
        )
        if not files:
            messagebox.showinfo("ì•ˆë‚´", "ìº¡ì²˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.")
            return
        latest = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, files[0])
        image = Image.open(latest)
        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(image, lang="eng+kor")

        txt_path = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, "ocr_result.txt")
        with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(text)
        os.startfile(txt_path)

    threading.Thread(target=_run).start()


def open_folder():
    os.startfile(os.path.abspath(SAVE_DIR))

    color_label.pack(side="left", padx=2)
